com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils

Class SCUIJSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils.SCUIJSONUtils

  • public class SCUIJSONUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ALWAYS_ARRAY
      Directive on an xpath to ensure that the element with the same xpath is always transformed to an array while XML to JSON conversion.
      static java.lang.String ALWAYS_OBJECT
      Directive on an xpath to ensure that the element with the same xpath is always transformed to an object while XML to JSON conversion.

      • getXpathTransformationDirectivesMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getXpathTransformationDirectivesMap()
        Getter for map containing xpath transformation directives.

        Returned map will have xpaths as keys and respective directives as values.

        Expected directives:
        • SCUIJSONUtils#ALWAYS_ARRAY
        • SCUIJSONUtils#ALWAYS_OBJECT
        map containing xpath transformation directives

      • setXpathTransformationDirectivesMap

        public static void setXpathTransformationDirectivesMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        Setter for map containing xpath transformation directives.

        Map should have xpaths as keys and respective directives as values.

        Expected directives:
        • SCUIJSONUtils#ALWAYS_ARRAY
        • SCUIJSONUtils#ALWAYS_OBJECT
        map map containing xpath as keys and respective directives as values

      • getJSONFromXML

        public static java.lang.String getJSONFromXML(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        This method will return a JSON string for a given input XML. doc Document to be converted to JSON String JSON of the XML passed Use getJSONFromXML(Document, SCUIContext)

      • getJSONFromXML

        public static java.lang.String getJSONFromXML(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                              SCUIContext context,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> overrideXpathTransformationDirectivesMap)
        This method will return a JSON string for a given input XML. doc Document to be converted to JSON context The UI context overrideXpathTransformationDirectivesMap Map containing xpath transformation directives. The entries in this map will override individual entries in global map.

        Map should have xpaths as keys and respective directives as values.

        Expected directives:
        • ALWAYS_ARRAY
        • ALWAYS_OBJECT
        #forceXpathToTransformArray(String) #forceXpathToTransformObject(String) String JSON of the XML passed

      • getXmlFromJSON

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getXmlFromJSON(java.lang.String json)
        This method will generate a Document for the given JSON string. Data will not be validated against datatype validation rules.
        Use SCUIJSONUtils#getXmlFromJSON(String, String, SCUIContext); to enable data validation. json The json string Document xml representation of the given JSON Object. SCUIJSONUtils#getXmlFromJSON(String, String, SCUIContext)

      • getXmlFromJSON

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getXmlFromJSON(java.lang.String json,
                                                  java.lang.String ns,
                                                  SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method will generate a Document for the given JSON string. Data in XML will be validated against datatype validation rules. json The json string ns Namespace; Used in data validation. uiContext ui context Document xml representation of the given JSON Object. data validation will not happen during json to xml transformations. Use getXmlFromJSON(String) method instead.

      • getXmlFromJSON

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getXmlFromJSON(java.lang.String json,
                                                  java.lang.String rootName,
                                                  java.lang.String ns,
                                                  SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method will generate a Document for the given JSON string. Data in XML will be validated against datatype validation rules. json The json string rootName The root name of the Document to be created ns Namespace; Used in data validation. uiContext ui context Document xml representation of the given JSON Object. SCUIJSONException data validation will not happen during json to xml transformations. Use getXmlFromJSON(String, String) method instead.

                                                  java.lang.String rootName)

        Use SCUIJSONUtils#getXmlFromJSON(String, String, SCUIContext); to enable data validation. json The json string rootName The root name of the Document to be created Document xml representation of the given JSON Object. SCUIJSONUtils#getXmlFromJSON(String, String, SCUIContext)
